## R Markdown

```{r recruitment}
library(networkD3)

# Define nodes with numbers
nodes <- data.frame(
  name = c("Applications (45)", "First Call (13)", "Rejected (11)", "No Answer (21)", "Interviews (9)", "Declined (4)", "Offers (2)", "No Offer (7)")
)

# Define links
links <- data.frame(
  source = c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 4, 4),  # Index of source nodes
  target = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7),  # Index of target nodes
  value = c(13, 11, 21, 9, 4, 2, 7) # Number of transitions
)

# Create Sankey diagram
sankeyNetwork(Links = links, Nodes = nodes, 
              Source = "source", Target = "target", 
              Value = "value", NodeID = "name", 
              units = "Applications", fontSize = 12, nodeWidth = 30)

```
